section: Upon expiration or termination of the Agreement for any reason, Network Affiliate shall pay NCM the value of the NCM Equipment, if any, that remains on NCMs financial statements as of the time of such expiration or termination. Upon payment of such amount to NCM by Network Affiliate at the time of such expiration or termination, NCMs ownership interest in the NCM Equipment will transfer to Network Affiliate.
explanation: This section stipulates that upon termination, the Network Affiliate must purchase the remaining depreciated value of the small d equipment from NCM. However, it doesn't specify the method of determining this value clearly. The term 'value...that remains on NCM's financial statements' is ambiguous. It's unclear what accounting method will be used to determine this value, potentially leading to disputes.

section: For each twelve-month period following the Effective Date during the Term, and as long as Network Affiliates attendance base in the Theatres for the twelve (12) month period is equal to or greater than 400,000 patrons (the Base Amount), the amount paid by NCM pursuant to Section 7.1(b) shall be not less than $ .17 per Theatre patron during such period with such amount increasing by 5% on each anniversary of the Effective Date (the Minimum Fee).
explanation: The section is missing the actual dollar amount that NCM has to pay. There is a blank space where the dollar amount is supposed to be.

section: NCM may terminate this Agreement upon thirty (30) days written notice to Network Affiliate in the event that distribution of the Service to all of the Theatres listed on Exhibit B is permanently discontinued.
explanation: This section allows NCM to terminate the agreement if the service to the theaters listed in Exhibit B is permanently discontinued. However, Exhibit B can be modified from time to time (as stated in the definition of 'Theatres'). This creates a contradiction: NCM can terminate if service to Exhibit B theaters is discontinued, but Exhibit B can change, making it unclear which theaters are relevant for this termination clause at any given time. What happens if theatres are added to Exhibit B after the effective date, and service is discontinued to those theatres?
